name: ed3d-plugins
description: Unified marketplace for ed3d's Claude Code development toolkit

plugins.name: ed3d-00-getting-started
plugins.description: Getting started guide and onboarding for ed3d-plugins

plugins.name: ed3d-plan-and-execute
plugins.description: Planning and execution workflows for Claude Code. Based on obra/superpowers.

plugins.name: ed3d-house-style
plugins.description: ed3d's house style for software development

plugins.name: ed3d-basic-agents
plugins.description: Core agents for general-purpose tasks. Other plugins expect this to exist.

plugins.name: ed3d-research-agents
plugins.description: Agents used for research across multiple data sources.

plugins.name: ed3d-extending-claude
plugins.description: Knowledge skills for extending Claude Code: creating plugins, commands, agents, skills, hooks, and MCP servers

plugins.name: ed3d-hook-skill-reinforcement
plugins.description: EXPERIMENTAL. A UserPromptSubmit hook that directs the model to consider and activate useful skills.

plugins.name: ed3d-hook-claudemd-reminder
plugins.description: A PostToolUse hook that reminds to invoke project-claude-librarian before committing when git status or git log reveals changes that may warrant CLAUDE.md updates.

plugins.name: ed3d-playwright
plugins.description: Playwright automation toolkit with MCP integration, specialized agent for browser control, and best practice skills
